title: Steve the Noob 3
description: This Minecraft Diary Is 5,000 Words With Over 20 Pictures (Custom Crafted Scenes to Accompany the Story) Follow Steve the Noob Again on His Next Hilarious Adventure After completing the defensive structure, Steve is taking a break for a bit. But even though he is on break, he still manages to get himself into trouble. Find out what awaits our hero in this next volume of Steve the Noob.
